title: Opinion: Artificial intelligence is here to stay, so let’s teach it in class

title: Social media is teaching children how to use AI. How can teachers keep up?
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping how students write essays, practice languages and complete assignments. Teachers are also experimenting with AI for lesson planning, grading and feedback. The pace is so fast that schools, universities and policymakers are struggling to keep up.

title: Elon Musk Dethroned as World’s Richest Person
description: The xAI founder is just the latest person to suffer from the rise of artificial intelligence.
content: Elon Musk has been dethroned as the world’s richest person by Larry Ellison, after holding the top spot for more than 300 days. The Tesla founder was toppled from the No. 1 spot after 81-year-old Ellison, chairman and chief technology officer of data... [16669 chars]

title: HPU blends AI with traditional knowledge for disaster warning systems in Himalayan states
description: Shimla, Sep 10 (PTI) Himachal Pradesh University (HPU) will blend Artificial Intelligence (AI) with traditional localised knowledge to develop futuristic early disaster warning systems for hilly states across the Himalayan regions, which are prone to weather-related devastation, a varsity official said on Wednesday. Talking to the media here, HPU Vice Chancellor Dr Mahavir Singh said, […]
content: The primary purpose of the centre is to ensure that the research outcomes and their benefits reach the community level and policymakers. With this in mind, emphasis is being placed on the amalgamation of AI with local community wisdom and experience ... [2346 chars]

title: Nvidia unveils new AI chips for video, software generation
description: NVIDIA said on Tuesday it would launch a new artificial intelligence (AI) chip by the end of next year, designed to handle complex functions such as creating videos and software.
content:
NVIDIA said on Tuesday it would launch a new artificial intelligence (AI) chip by the end of next year, designed to handle complex functions such as creating videos and software.

title: US stock market today: S&P 500 and Nasdaq hit records as Oracle stuns Wall Street with AI forecast while Dow slips on Apple losses
description: U.S. stock market turned mixed on Wednesday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq climbing to new record highs while the Dow slipped, as investors weighed cooling inflation data against a flood of corporate news. The highlight of the session was Oracles jaw-dropping 41% surge, its best day in more than three decades, after the company issued an ambitious forecast tied to artificial intelligence cloud demand.
